pages.text: $(b)Silver$() is the foundation of this mod. Mine $(#)Silver Ore$() in the overworld or deepslate layers to obtain $(#)Raw Silver$(). Smelt it into $(#)Silver Ingots$() for crafting.$(br2)$(b)Mortar and Pestle$() - Craft with stone and a stick. Used to grind materials into dusts.$(br2)$(b)Bone Dust$() - Grind bones in the mortar.$(br)$(b)Amethyst Dust$() - Grind amethyst shards in the mortar.
Craft the mortar and pestle to begin grinding materials.
